zh: 从今天早上开始就一直在下大雨，所以我不想到任何地方去。

en: You'll fatten up if you eat that much.
zh: 你吃那么多会发胖的。

en: If a man had 11 sheep and all but 9 died, how many sheep would he have left?

en: I bought an anti-theft system for my bike.
zh: 我为我的自行车买了一个防盗系统。

en: I want to sleep! Rather than live I want to sleep!

en: I want to sleep! Sleep rather than live!
zh: 我想睡觉！宁愿睡觉也不愿活着！

en: Quick, turn off the lamp, I want to hide in the darkness.

en: He who looks from outside through an open window doesn't see anywhere as much as he who looks through a closed window.
zh: 从外面透过敞开的窗户看的人，不如透过紧闭的窗户看的人看得多。

en: He who looks from outside through an open window never sees as much as he who looks at a closed window.
zh: 从外面透过敞开的窗户看的人，永远不如看紧闭的窗户的人看得多。

en: Obey thyself.

en: Nothing can be preserved that is not good.

en: Never read any book that is not a year old.

en: What is a weed? A plant whose virtues have not yet been discovered.

en: You shall have joy, or you shall have power, said God; you shall not have both.

en: Poetry must be new as foam, and as old as the rock.

en: Children are all foreigners.

en: Truth is beautiful, without doubt; but so are lies.

en: O Romeo Romeo, wherefore art thou Romeo?

en: O Romeo Romeo, why are you Romeo?

en: My friends are my estate. Forgive me then the avarice to hoard them.
zh: 朋友是我的财富。请原谅我吝啬地把他们珍藏。

en: I never drink tea with lemon.

en: Better to reign in Hell, than serve in Heaven.

en: Give me the liberty to know, to utter, and to argue freely according to conscience, above all liberties.

en: Man is distinguished from all other creatures by the faculty of laughter.

en: A person usually has two reasons for doing something: a good reason and the real reason.

en: Experience is the best of schoolmasters, only the school-fees are heavy.

en: Time is a certain fraction of eternity.

en: Time is the father of truth.

en: Carla, the singer, has a great voice.
zh: 卡拉，那位歌手，嗓音很棒。

en: Santa Claus is dropping from the sky!
zh: 圣诞老人从天上掉下来了！

en: Have you read the "Liaisons Dangereuses"?
zh: 你看过《危险关系》吗？

en: I'm not a magician.
zh: 我不是魔术师。

en: The new bank is on Baker Street.
zh: 新的银行在贝克街。

en: I know a guy named Smith.
zh: 我认识一个叫史密斯的人。

en: She's only a child.
zh: 她只是个孩子。

en: I love the girl I met yesterday.
zh: 我爱昨天遇到的那个女孩。

en: I'm completely wet because of the heavy rain. Will you come and pick me up with your car?
zh: 因为下大雨，我全身都湿透了。你能开车来接我吗？

en: Staying up late at night is very bad for your skin.
zh: 熬夜对皮肤很不好。

en: Oh, I forgot. Today is garbage day!
zh: 哦，我忘了。今天倒垃圾！

en: I'm going in first.
zh: 我先走了。

en: I'm going to take a bath first.
zh: 我先去洗个澡。

en: How was today's test?
zh: 今天的考试怎么样？

en: I've still got a lot of work to do.
zh: 我还有很多工作要做。

en: Will it really be OK with this? Will it go well?
zh: 这样真的没问题吗？会顺利吗？

en: I'm itchy from mosquito bites. Do you have something for it?
zh: 我被蚊子咬了，好痒。你有什么药吗？

en: What do you intend to do from now on? Do you have an objective?
zh: 你接下来打算做什么？你有什么目标吗？

en: I already told you not to smoke in your room.
zh: 我已经跟你说过了，不要在房间里抽烟。

en: Are you joking or are you serious when you say this?
zh: 你这是在开玩笑还是认真的？

en: That's a bit of a problem.
zh: 这有点麻烦。

en: These charred bits are tasty.
zh: 这些焦的部分很好吃。

en: After, cook it on a low flame for 30 minutes and you're done.
zh: 之后，用小火煮30分钟就完成了。

en: Lastly, cook on low heat for thirty minutes and it's done.
zh: 最后，用小火煮三十分钟就完成了。

en: If you go by Shinkansen, you'll be there in no time.
zh: 如果你坐新干线，你很快就能到那里。

en: You're working hard, eh. But don't push yourself too hard.
zh: 你很努力啊。但是不要太勉强自己。

en: What the heck do you expect to achieve, constantly doing this kind of thing? Aren't there more ways to go about it?
zh: 你一直做这种事，到底想达到什么目的？难道没有更好的方法吗？

en: Please come home sometimes.
zh: 请常回家看看。

en: Mother, I'm sorry for causing you trouble all the time.
zh: 妈妈，对不起，我总是给你添麻烦。

en: Don't say that you can't do it before trying. You're not even doing it so how can you say that you can't do it?
zh: 不要没试就说做不到。你都没做，怎么能说做不到呢？

en: I get weirdly sleepy when I listen to this song.
zh: 我听这首歌的时候会莫名其妙地想睡觉。

en: The president is flying into town by helicopter.
zh: 总统乘直升机飞抵本市。

en: He disliked school.
zh: 他不喜欢上学。

en: They are in trouble. Can you help them?
zh: 他们有麻烦了。你能帮助他们吗？

en: She admired him.
zh: 她很钦佩他。

en: She adores him.
zh: 她很爱慕他。

en: She advised him not to go.
zh: 她建议他不要去。

en: She advised him to stay in bed for two more days.
zh: 她建议他再卧床休息两天。

en: She advised him to exercise.
zh: 她建议他做运动。

en: She advised him to give up drinking.
zh: 她建议他戒酒。

en: She advised him to go abroad while he was still young.
zh: 她劝他趁年轻出国。

en: She advised him to go there.
zh: 她建议他去那里。

en: She advised him to go to the hospital, but he didn't follow her advice.
zh: 她建议他去医院，但他没有听她的劝告。

en: She advised him to visit Boston, because she thought it was the most beautiful city in the world.
zh: 她建议他去波士顿，因为她认为那是世界上最美丽的城市。

en: She argued with him about their children's education.
zh: 她和他争论孩子们的教育问题。

en: She asked him out on a date.
zh: 她约他出去约会。

en: She asked him why he was crying, but he didn't answer.
zh: 她问他为什么哭，但他没有回答。

en: She attacked him with her fists.
zh: 她用拳头袭击了他。

en: She begged him to stay.
zh: 她恳求他留下。

en: She bit him.
zh: 她咬了他。

en: She bought him some candy.
zh: 她给他买了一些糖果。

en: She called him on the phone.
zh: 她给他打电话。

en: She called him.
zh: 她给他打电话了。

en: She calls him every night.
zh: 她每天晚上都给他打电话。

en: She choked him.
zh: 她掐住了他的脖子。

en: She complained to him about the noise.
zh: 她向他抱怨噪音。

en: She cooked a special dinner for him.
zh: 她为他做了一顿特别的晚餐。

en: She cooks for him every day.
zh: 她每天为他做饭。

en: She cooks for him.
zh: 她为他做饭。

en: She cremated him against his wishes.
zh: 她违背他的意愿火化了他。

en: She decided to marry him.
zh: 她决定嫁给他。

en: She denied having met him.
zh: 她否认见过他。

en: She despises him.
zh: 她鄙视他。

en: She devoted herself to him.
zh: 她全身心地投入到他身上。

en: She did her best to help him.
zh: 她尽了最大努力帮助他。

en: She didn't even try to help.
zh: 她甚至都没想帮忙。

en: She divorced him after many years of unhappiness.
zh: 经过多年的不快乐，她和他离婚了。

en: She doesn't listen to him.
zh: 她不听他的话。

en: She doesn't live with him.
zh: 她不和他住在一起。

en: She dumped him for a richer man.
zh: 她为了一个更有钱的男人甩了他。

en: She dumped him.
zh: 她甩了他。

en: She expected him to take the bribe.
zh: 她期望他收下贿赂。

en: She first met him in Boston.
zh: 她第一次在波士顿见到他。

en: She fooled him.
zh: 她骗了他。

en: She found him handsome.
zh: 她觉得他很帅。

en: She gave him a lot of money.
zh: 她给了他很多钱。

en: She gave him a nice present.
zh: 她给了他一件不错的礼物。

en: She gave him a present.
zh: 她给了他一件礼物。

en: She gave him a sweater.
zh: 她给了他一件毛衣。

en: She gave him his first kiss.
zh: 她给了他初吻。

en: She gave him some food.
zh: 她给了他一些食物。

en: She got engaged to him.
zh: 她和他订婚了。

en: She got no answer from him.
zh: 她没有收到他的回复。

en: She handed him his jacket.
zh: 她把他的夹克递给了他。

en: She has him under her thumb.
zh: 他被她吃得死死的。

en: She has never seen him.
zh: 她从未见过他。

en: She has never sung a song with him.
zh: 她从未和他一起唱过歌。

en: She has never visited him.
zh: 她从未拜访过他。

en: She hates him.
zh: 她讨厌他。

en: She heard him cry.
zh: 她听到他哭了。
